exceptions.tactic: intros d a0 a1 a2 s1 s2 pl c H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11 H12.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 d a0 a1 -> predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 d a0 a2

Premises:
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => preDTA_ref_ok d -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a0 a1 : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
coacc_transitive_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a2
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 d a0 a1 -> predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 d a0 a2
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
coacc_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a1 a2 -> coacc d a0 a2
coacc_transitive_def = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => forall a2 : ad, coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a2 a0 -> coacc d a2 a1 : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
MapFold_Put_disjoint_1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b : M, op a b = op b a) -> forall (p : positive) (f : ad -> A -> M) (pf : ad -> ad) (a1 a2 : ad) (y1 y2 : A), N.lxor a1 a2 = N.pos p -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf (MapPut1 A a1 y1 a2 y2 p) = op (f (pf a1) y1) (f (pf a2) y2)
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a0 m) b = Some true
predta_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) (b : ad), MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a m) b = Some true -> ensemble_base state d m -> (exists (a0 : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ prec_occur p b /\ MapGet bool m a0 = Some true) \/ a = b
predta_kill_non_coacc_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s : state), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ coacc d a a0 < -> MapGet state (predta_kill_non_coacc d a) a0 = Some s
pl_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl) a = Some true -> prec_occur pl a
predta_coacc_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0
predta_coacc_0_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states_0 d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0
st_coacc_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), state_ref_ok s d -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p a -> MapGet bool (st_coacc d s) a = Some true
predta_kill_non_coacc_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 d a a
predta_coacc_0_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d d' : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d' d -> MapGet state d' a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d' m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_0 d d' m) b = Some true
predta_coacc_fix_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) a0 = Some true
predta_coacc_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) a0 = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
st_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad), MapGet bool (st_coacc d s) a = Some true -> exists (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ prec_occur p a
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
MapDelta_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = None
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
MapDelta_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
MapDelta_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
non_coacc_kill_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet state (non_coacc_kill d m) a = Some s
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
pl_coacc = fix pl_coacc (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) {struct pl} : Map bool := match pl with | prec_cons a la ls => map_replace bool (map_or (pl_coacc d la) (pl_coacc d ls)) a true | prec_empty => map_mini state d end : preDTA -> prec_list -> Map bool
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
predta_coacc_0_rev : forall (d d' : preDTA) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), MapGet bool (predta_coacc_0 d d' m) b = Some true -> ensemble_base state d' m -> exists (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d' a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ prec_occur p b /\ MapGet bool m a = Some true

```  
intros d a0 a1 a2 s1 s2 pl c H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11 H12.
apply predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 with (a1:=a1); auto.
apply coacc_nxt with (s1:=s1) (pl:=pl) (c:=c); auto.
apply coacc_transitive with (a1:=a1); auto.
apply predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 with (a1:=a1); auto.
```

original: intros d a0 a1 a2 s1 s2 pl c H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11 H12. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 with (a1:=a1); auto. apply coacc_nxt with (s1:=s1) (pl:=pl) (c:=c); auto. apply coacc_transitive with (a1:=a1); auto. apply predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 with (a1:=a1); auto.
